metadata.title: CVE-2020-14002 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: PuTTY 0.68 through 0.73 has an Observable Discrepancy leading to aninformation leak in the algorithm negotiation. This allowsman-in-the-middle attackers to target initial connection attempts (where nohost key for the server has been cached by the client).

criterions.comment: putty: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
